name: Best of Commodore Amiga Demoscene Music
blurb: We created a library of the best Amiga Modules from the Demoscene available for free download and look for supporters.

name: Destroy All Presets: ▲ re-mixable chiptune album!
blurb: Pre-order my newest album and help create a re-mixable cartridge version for the GameBoy Advance.

name: Nine Inch Nintendos? 8-Bit Nails? Something like that!
blurb: Witness an entire Nine Inch Nails album remade on various classic game systems and computers.

name: Project Atma - I Fight Dragons Creates An Epic New Album
blurb: Chicago's premiere Chiptune Rock band embarks on a bold musical quest to take over the world, or at least the tri-county area.

name: Back in Time Symphonic Collection - C64 Symphonic Box Set
blurb: Commodore 64 goes symphonic: 3 albums, 5 stretch albums. The first step to the Albert Hall with the London Symphony Orchestra? Maybe!

name: A Rainbow Kitten Christmas
blurb: Tide the Yule and ring in the new year with your favorite polychromatic feline as Rainbow Kitten plays the holiday classics you love.

name: Back in Time Brighton '15 - Live stage show of C64 Music
blurb: Back in Time Live 2015 Brighton: a live concert of C64 music hosted by Ben Daglish starring SID80s, PPOT, Fastloaders and more.

name: Boy Meets Robot Make a Chiptune Rock Album
blurb: Mike and R.O.B. make geeky chiptune rock with a guitar and a Game Boy. Will you help us release our debut album?

name: That New New Shrimps Album
blurb: We're holding this 100% finished Shrimps album hostage: either this project funds & we press it to vinyl or we NEVER release it.

name: In The RP2A Over The Sea: Neutral Milk Hotel Cover Album
blurb: A chiptune arrangement of Neutral Milk Hotel's "In The Aeroplane Over The Sea" using a Nintendo, pressed to vinyl record.

name: 8-Bit Symphony Pro - double orchestral CD of 8-bit classics
blurb: Hollywood-grade orchestra - Monty on the Run, Zoids, Last Ninja®, Flash Gordon, Aztec Challenge, Forbidden Forest and Rob Hubbard!

name: Hessian: Commodore 64 chiptune game soundtrack on Vinyl & CD
blurb: The Original Game Soundtrack series - featuring a Rob Hubbard / Jason Page stretch goal

name: 8-Bit Symphony Pro: Second Half - more C64 orchestral epics
blurb: Hollywood-grade orchestra records the epic Master of Magic, Nemesis the Warlock, Wizardry, Super Huey, Dragon's Lair II and lots more.

name: C:\Change - A Chiptune Tribute to Beck
blurb: A chiptune arrangement of "Sea Change" by Beck using only a Nintendo and a Gameboy, pressed to vinyl.
